Example.Title: Fixed Columns
Example.Description: Arrange child elements according to the number of columns
Example.Code: <Grid xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:panels="clr-namespace:Rubik.Theme.Panels;assembly=Rubik.Theme"> <panels:FlowPanel Space="20,10" Padding="20,10" Columns="4"> <Button Content="1" Height="80"/> <Button Content="2" Height="60"/> <Button Content="3" Height="90"/> <Button Content="4" Height="150"/> <Button Content="5" Height="120"/> <Button Content="6" Height="100"/> <Button Content="7" Height="120"/> <Button Content="8" Height="100"/> <Button Content="9" Height="100"/> <Button Content="10" Height="120"/> </panels:FlowPanel> </Grid>
